text: "Allt fyrir ástina" (All in the Name of Love) is an album by Icelandic pop singer and disc jockey Páll Óskar, released on November 7, 2007.http://www.icelandicmusic.com/PaulOscar/ icelandicmusic.com ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" ! # !! width="200" |Title !!
